user_query: My family and I are planning a vacation to Europe next summer. Can you suggest some popular tourist destinations and provide the latest NHL news to keep us updated on our favorite teams while we are traveling? Additionally, fetch the player standings for the 2020 season.

TaskList.description: Research and compile a list of popular tourist destinations in Europe for family vacations.
Fetch the latest NHL news to provide updates while traveling.
Retrieve player standings for the NHL 2020 season.
